introduction: Life has it's moments. moments that define us. These moments influence the choices we all make. One moment can be total bliss, and with the wrong choice you can find yourself falling apart. Each choice and action leads down a different road. Lisa Howe thought she had it all. A perfect life with the man of her dreams. Until she came to the cross roads, and found herself in the arms of another man. Karma Baby is a short film taking a dramatic and vivid look into the life of a woman and how temptation, rumors, lies and deceit have her caught up in a whirlwind of regret and consequence.—Baran, Steve
